Name: Carthaginians
History: Carthage, a city-state in modern-day Tunisia, was a formidable force in the western Mediterranean, eventually taking over much of North Africa and modern-day Spain in the third century B.C. The sailors of Carthage were among the fiercest contenders on the high seas, and masters of naval trade. They deployed towered War Elephants on the battlefield to fearsome effect, and had defensive walls so strong, they were never breached.

Technologies.Name: - Time of Need
Technologies.Description: Towers, Siege Weapons, Sacred Band units build/train 25% faster.

Heroes.Name: Forest Elephant
Heroes.Description: Melee elephant cavalry. Good against structures and siege units.

Heroes.Name: Sacred Band Infantry
Heroes.Description: Melee infantry. Good against melee units. Trained at the Temple.

Heroes.Name: Sacred Band Cavalry
Heroes.Description: Melee cavalry. Good against ranged units. Trained at the Temple.

CivBonuses.Name: - Structures
CivBonuses.Description: build 10% faster for each phase advancement.

Structures.Name: - Academy
Structures.Description: Researches advanced technologies with defence, military and siege benefits.

Structures.Name: - Embassy
Structures.Description: Hires mercenary units in addition to the Fortress. Replaces the Stables.
